title: Planned Parenthood's War Against Healthcare Workers, Part 2
itunes:title: Planned Parenthood's War Against Healthcare Workers, Part 2
description:
In part 2 of our interview we discuss Planned Parenthood's anti-union retaliation and the importance of community support to workers organizing.
